data.description: Parser/writer between hash tree and XML file
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
XML::TreePP module parses XML file and expand it for a hash tree.
    And also generate XML file from a hash tree. This is a pure Perl
    implementation. You can also download XML from remote web server
    like XMLHttpRequest object at JavaScript language. I think that
    XML::TreePP is enough fast and easy to use!

    XML::Mini is also pure Perl implementation, but it is 10 times
    slower than XML::TreePP. XML::Simple is NOT pure Perl and it needs
    XML::Parser. XML::Parser::Lite::Tree and XML::Parser::EasyTree don't
    generate just a pure hash tree.
